turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, Can I get a Tall Caramel Brulée Latte with Whole Milk to pick up, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location would you like to visit?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks in Eureka.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's the Starbucks location in Eureka, California, correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. What time do you want to pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick it up at 9:30.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that 9:30 AM or PM?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: AM please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Your drink will be ready at 9:30 AM for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I pay using the app?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To confirm, you'd like to pay using the Starbuck app?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Go ahead and submit payment using the Starbucks app.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, can I help you with anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Have a nice day.
